title.rendered: Sector 93 is Nestled in the Heart of New Gurugram: Luxury Premium Floors Trending

content.rendered:
It requires tons of energies and a lot more exercise when we think of buying or investing in a property and yet we fear some uncertainty that looms large indefinite for one reason or the other; reason why the government at Centre brought in the Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act 2016 to restore homebuyers’ faith in the system, to regulate real estate market and create a balance between the two major stakeholders – this balance certainly was missing or tilted towards promoters that had widened the gap between the said stakeholders. The RERA has done a wonderful job in this regard and that is visible in the market and it has helped the promoters, rather, whose intentions have been fair in complying with the acts/rules as they won trust of prospective property buyers – Signature Global is one among such promoters which made a niche in this regard by providing flats/floors to buyers from mediocre families in the range of their pocket budget with all luxuries that one could not think of even in dream in a city like Gurugram where many promoters are selling similar products at too high a price.

In recent years only, the new Gurugram sectors became hotspots in terms of real estate projects as many promoters came up with residential and commercial projects in the backdrop of massive developments – roads and highways, metro and rail corridors followed by enactments cum augmentation of water, sewer and electricity services.



Sector 93 is bang on the Gurugram Pataudi road, and barely, 2.5 KM from the Dwarka expressway, is one emerging area that the prospective property buyers find it suitable for booking floors, luxury floors with their job location be it Manesar, Pataudi, Farukhnagar, Sohna, Sonipat, Delhi or Udyog Vihar (Gurgaon) all easily connected with the excellent road networks and bang on the proposed metro route that is likely to connect Badshahpur Chowk, on Rajiv Chowk to on Road, with Patuadi. The Haryana government is planning to expand the city towards Sohna, Pataudi and Farukh Nagar by expanding intra-city road and rail/metro network in such a way that seamless connectivity can become smooth and people can travel well within the city and in the entire national capital region hassle free.



Living in Sector 93 is going to be luxury. One can use public transport that is currently fantastic with government bus service and it is going to be excellent with proposed metro corridor. Meanwhile, one can travel Sonipat, Manesar, Sohna as daily commuting is not tough at all thanks to well connected road/expressway network. But what is most important is investing in a property considering these above mentioned aspects but not less important is selecting a project, integrity of promoter and promoters’ track record that one can check through government records that one can easily do. Simple logic; a prospective buyer should check which promoter is trending in the real estate market in Gurugram as on date in terms of premium independent floors in your pocket budget with all the luxuries and ambience and then site’s location. So, budget friendly aspect is very important. Then, must check integrity; Signature Global has carved a niche in budget friendly premium floors that the trend has shown of past decade only – construction quality, theme behind every construction is environment friendly, greenery friendly in terms using construction materials.    



Gurugram’s population is increasing 1.5 lakh every year to 2 lakh and this has propelled the housing demand, job requirements – besides automobile and garment industries that provide large opportunity of jobs, the real estate industry/sector no less in providing jobs to professionals to construction workers at large.          

The project Signature Global City 93, thus, is nestled in the heart of New Gurugram, as this project is strategically connected with two major roads – Gurgaon Pataudi and KMP expressway and it is bordering IMT Manesar, besides Dwarka Expressway using what one can easily reach out to Delhi, international airport and Sohna, Rewari etc. One can assert his/her liberty in the independence of each spacious floor of the project with the dynamic architectural language builds luxury, contemporary homes with modern amenities. All these converge to create cohesive community, where residents interact with each other under a soothingly lush green environment.



The complex and premium floors of project has been designed by AEDAS, an architectural firm of international presence with expertise in the urban designing and master planning.
